document_api_meta.title: Get Shop LIVE Performance List
document_api_meta.env_desc: Returns a list of LIVE stream sessions and associated metrics for a shop.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: start_date_ge
request_query_param.desc:
Start date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone.
In the parameter name, "ge" refers to "greater than or equal to" (inclusive)

request_query_param.name: end_date_lt
request_query_param.desc:
End date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone.
In the parameter name, "lt" refers to "less than" (exclusive)

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
Number of products per page.
Max value: 100
Default value: 10

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc:
Field to sort on.
Default: gmv
Available values:
- gmv
- products_added
- different_products_sold
- sku_orders
- unit_sold
- customers
- 24h_live_gmv

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
Sort direction.
Available values: ASC, DESC
Default value: DESC

request_query_param.name: currency
request_query_param.desc:
Currency.
Available values: USD, LOCAL
Default value: LOCAL

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc:
Page token, indicating the current position. Used for requesting next page data.
Leave this field empty for first time queries.

request_query_param.name: account_type
request_query_param.desc:
Types of the accounts under which videos were created.
Available values: ALL, OFFICIAL_ACCOUNTS, MARKETING_ACCOUNTS, AFFILIATE_ACCOUNTS
Default value: ALL

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^live_stream_sessions
response_param.desc: List of live performance metrics.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: ID of the LIVE

response_param.name: ^^title
response_param.desc: Title of the LIVE

response_param.name: ^^username
response_param.desc: The host's username

response_param.name: ^^start_time
response_param.desc: Start time of the LIVE, unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00).

response_param.name: ^^end_time
response_param.desc: End time of the LIVE, unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00).

response_param.name: ^^sales_performance
response_param.desc: Sale performance data of the LIVE related to the shop

response_param.name: ^^^gmv
response_param.desc: Overall Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) for the live.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: GMV amount in the corresponding currency.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP).

response_param.name: ^^^products_added
response_param.desc: The number of products added to the LIVE.

response_param.name: ^^^different_products_sold
response_param.desc: The number of products for which sales were generated from the livestream

response_param.name: ^^^created_sku_orders
response_param.desc: The total number of orders created during the selected period, including those with pending payment for cash-on-delivery or PayLater. Example: If a customer orders 3 units of SKU A and 2 units of SKU B, the SKU orders would be 2.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_orders
response_param.desc: The total number of paid orders from this LIVE during the selected period. This includes SKUs that represent unique product variations like size, colour or model. Example: If a customer orders 3 units of SKU A and 2 units of SKU B, the SKU orders would be 2.

response_param.name: ^^^unit_sold
response_param.desc: The total number of individual items sold from all LIVEs. Example: If a customer buys 3 units of SKU A and 2 units of SKU B, the items sold would be 5.

response_param.name: ^^^customers
response_param.desc: The total number of customers who placed orders directly from this LIVE.

response_param.name: ^^^avg_price
response_param.desc: The total price paid for all items divided by the number of items sold.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The average price paid for all items divided by the number of items sold.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP).

response_param.name: ^^^click_to_order_rate
response_param.desc: The percentage of customers who clicked product links from this LIVE and purchased those products. Number of purchases divided by the number of product clicks, multiplied by 100.

response_param.name: ^^^24h_live_gmv
response_param.desc: The total amount paid for orders within 24 hours of viewing this LIVE, including returns and refunds.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: GMV amount in the corresponding currency.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP).

response_param.name: ^^interaction_performance
response_param.desc:
This object will return only when the account type is:
- OFFICIAL_ACCOUNTS:
- MARKETING_ACCOUNTS

response_param.name: ^^^acu
response_param.desc: Average concurrent users

response_param.name: ^^^pcu
response_param.desc: Peak concurrent users

response_param.name: ^^^viewers
response_param.desc: Number of unique viewers of the LIVE video posted during the selected period.

response_param.name: ^^^views
response_param.desc: Number of views for the LIVE video posted during the selected period.

response_param.name: ^^^avg_viewing_duration
response_param.desc: The average time each user spent watching LIVEs. Total viewing time divided by number of views, in seconds.

response_param.name: ^^^comments
response_param.desc: Number of comments on the LIVE video posted during the selected period.

response_param.name: ^^^shares
response_param.desc: Number of times the LIVE video posted during the selected period were shared.

response_param.name: ^^^likes
response_param.desc: The number of likes a LIVE video received during the selected time period.

response_param.name: ^^^new_followers
response_param.desc: The number of viewers who followed creators from the video during the selected period.

response_param.name: ^^^product_impressions
response_param.desc: Number of product impressions during the LIVE video posted during the selected period, including product lists and product cards

response_param.name: ^^^product_clicks
response_param.desc: Number of product clicks during the LIVE video posted during the selected period, including clicks on product lists and product cards.

response_param.name: ^^^click_through_rate
response_param.desc: The percentage of viewers who clicked on product links after seeing them in this LIVE. Number of clicks divided by the number of views, multiplied by 100.

response_param.name: ^latest_available_date
response_param.desc: Latest date in local timezone where data is ready (ISO 8601 format).

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: Page token for the next page request.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: Total number of LIVE stream sessions.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func analytics202508GetShopLIVEPerformanceListGet() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AnalyticsV202508API.Analytics202508ShopLivesPerformanceGet(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.StartDateGe("2024-09-01")
    request = request.EndDateLt("2024-09-08")
    request = request.PageSize(30)
    request = request.SortField("gmv")
    request = request.SortOrder("ASC")
    request = request.Currency("USD")
    request = request.PageToken("cGFnZV9udW1iZXI9MQ==")
    request = request.AccountType("OFFICIAL_ACCOUNTS")
    request = request.ShopCipher("GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3")
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access TikTok shop analytics such as live and video, GMV, orders and content traffic data such as CTR, visitors for a shop and products in shop.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your prior and go-forward TikTok Shop sales and traffic data by Shop and product, including but not limited to GMV, Number of orders, units sold, Number of buyers, product listings, product impressions and page views, Number of visitors, and click through rate (CTR), all by content type (video, live and product card).
